name: Concordia Maritime AB
description: Concordia Maritime AB is a leading Swedish shipping company established in 1984, primarily focused on the transportation of refined oil products and chemicals. The company operates a modern fleet of eco-friendly tankers, which are designed to meet the highest safety and environmental standards. With a commitment to sustainability, Concordia Maritime aims to minimize its carbon footprint and enhance energy efficiency through innovative vessel designs and operational practices. The company’s fleet includes a range of vessels, such as MR (Medium Range) tankers, which are capable of transporting a variety of cargo types including gasoline, jet fuel, and other refined products. Concordia Maritime is listed on the Nasdaq Stockholm stock exchange and has built a solid reputation for reliability and quality service over the years. The company focuses on long-term partnerships with its customers, providing flexible and tailored shipping solutions to meet their needs. In addition to its operational excellence, Concordia Maritime emphasizes compliance with international regulations and industry standards, ensuring a safe and responsible approach to marine transportation. The company is also exploring new technologies and alternative fuels to further enhance its sustainability efforts and maintain its competitive edge in the evolving shipping industry.
ceo: Kim B. A. B. B. K. R. H. M. De Boer

key_executives.name: Kim B. A. B. B. K. R. H. M. De Boer

seo.meta_title: Concordia Maritime AB | Sustainable Shipping Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Concordia Maritime AB, a Swedish shipping company specializing in the transportation of refined oil products and chemicals with a focus on sustainability and operational excellence.

faq.question: What does Concordia Maritime do?
faq.answer: Concordia Maritime operates a fleet of tankers for the transportation of refined oil products and chemicals.

faq.question: Where is Concordia Maritime headquartered?
faq.answer: Concordia Maritime is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

faq.question: What type of vessels does Concordia Maritime operate?
faq.answer: Concordia Maritime operates MR tankers and chemical tankers.
